text: Doda () is a district of Jammu and Kashmir. It is the third largest district in Jammu and Kashmir after Leh and Kargil. ==Tehsils of Doda== * Banihal Tehsil * Bhaderwah Tehsil * Doda Tehsil * Gandoh Tehsil * Kishtwar Tehsil * Ramban Tehsil * Thathri Tehsil ==Related pages== *Chinta Valley *Chenab River Category:Districts of Jammu and Kashmir
title: Doda district
